reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s very pigmented and cared for! Definitely takes awhile to dry but so so impressed by how sparkly it is and will definitely be using for my makeup looks. Loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They shine really nicely and putting them was super smooth. I love this product. The colors are all vibrant my favorite one was pink but the white was close 2nd as I can match it with my powder eyeliner and put them on top of that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really cute but kinda iffy?
reviews.reviewText: First of all I am happy that we get multiple colors to choose from. And I have almost used all of them for different makeup looks. When I’m at work or just out and about I get many compliments on my eye makeup and the main focus is always the glitter! But I do have to say, as much as I enjoy these bottles, I wish there were more uses? Let me explain because it’s not because the bottle is small lol. From the beginning I kind of noticed that the bottles were not filled all the way? Kind of like the glitter on the walls of the bottle were hiding the fact that there was less product in the actual bottle. I did hold it up to a light and it was true, I did not receive much product. Maybe it was just my order? But I do really wish it had more uses because it was definitely super cute! I’m having a debate right now to see if I wanna buy more, but I don’t want the same issue to occur if that’s the case for all their products :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: So the pictures of the product show something completely different from reality, but I've found a way to decrease some of that flaky texture so you can still enjoy a cute look.First, I don't recommend wearing any sort of eyeshadow with these. I tried layering it once and it looked awful. The glitter lifted my shadow and once dried, it crusted over. My lids looked like the Sahara desert. Second, it's super important that when applied, you use your finger or a sponge to dab the glitter on the lid. This is absolutely crucial to avoid having a nasty, crusty mess on your lids. I prefer my finger since it's more gentle and I have more control over where the product goes.I've found that some of the colors have more of an issue with flaking. Typically, it's the ones with smaller bits of glitter since they have to use so much glue to help them stick. Lastly, make sure your lids are completely dry before opening your eyes and continuing your make up. I made the mistake of applying this and then I had to deal with my lids sticking together since the glue dried them that way. It was not a fun experience.Overall, the product can produce cute results but you definitely have to play around with the application and the quality isn't the greatest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It dries fast but stays on all day it smells a bit weird but it works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it was recommended by a beauty influencer. This product was TERRIBLE! It made my eyelids itchy and it just flaked off and ended up all over my face and clothes. It didn't even last an hour on my eyes. I know it was only $9.99, but I would prefer to spend $10 more for better quality.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Definitely recommend this product, as you can see I have no makeup on but I just wanted to try this product as soon as possible! The liquid glitter is so pretty and it shimmers when the light is directed.
